newsitem.title: USA: Genesis Health to buy Doctors Health stock.
newsitem.headline: Genesis Health to buy Doctors Health stock.

text.p: Genesis Health Venture Inc said it had reached an agreement with Doctors Health System Inc of Owings Mills, Maryland, to purchase $10 million in Series C preferred stock.
The company said in a statement that after the purchase Genesis would hold a 10 percent stake in Doctors Health.

Genesis also agreed to acquire an additional $10 million of Series C preferred stock in Doctors Health upon the achievement of certain benchmarks. That purchase would raise Genesis' holdings to about 20 percent.
The Series C preferred stock will carry an eight percent cumulative dividend.
